org.apache.nutch.plugin

Interface Pluggable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HtmlParseFilter, IndexingFilter, IndexWriter, Parser, Protocol, ScoringFilter, URLFilter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScoringFilter, AnchorIndexingFilter, AutomatonURLFilter, BasicIndexingFilter, CCIndexingFilter, CCParseFilter, DomainBlacklistURLFilter, DomainURLFilter, ExtParser, FeedIndexingFilter, FeedParser, File, Ftp, HeadingsParseFilter, HTMLLanguageParser, HtmlParser, Http, Http, HttpBase, JSParseFilter, LanguageIndexingFilter, LinkAnalysisScoringFilter, MetadataIndexer, MetaTagsParser, MoreIndexingFilter, OPICScoringFilter, PrefixURLFilter, RegexURLFilter, RegexURLFilterBase, RelTagIndexingFilter, RelTagParser, ScoringFilters, SolrIndexWriter, StaticFieldIndexer, Subcollection, SubcollectionIndexingFilter, SuffixURLFilter, SWFParser, TikaParser, TLDIndexingFilter, TLDScoringFilter, URLMetaIndexingFilter, URLMetaScoringFilter, UrlValidator, ZipParser

    public interface Pluggable
    Defines the capability of a class to be plugged into Nutch. This is a common interface that must be implemented by all Nutch Extension Points.
    Author:
    Jérôme Charron
    See Also:
    About Plugins, plugin package description
